casebody.data:
Alvin BRATTON
v.
LOUISIANA DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC SAFETY AND CORRECTIONS NO. 2018-CI-0487 Supreme Court of Louisiana. September 21, 2018 WRIT NOT CONSIDERED. Petitioner has not demonstrated that he sought review in the court(s) below before filing in this Court nor shown the "extraordinary circumstances" that would justify bypassing that level of review. La.S.Ct.R. X § 5(b). CRICHTON, J., recused.
